column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our table ordered a dozen raw oysters with a mixture of east and west coast
column3: the 16 oz dry aged New York strip
column7: and the mashed potatoes. My favorites were the Brussels sprouts
column8: mashed potatoes and New York strip. The Brussels were so flavorful. The mashed potatoes came with whole pieces of roasted garlic in it. I loveeeee garlic
column9: so I was really happy about that. The steak was so tender and came out perfectly.
